description: Open-source intelligent agent for high-quality, personalized job application and lead generation, focusing on expert-level response quality and continuous improvement.
rules: Prioritize quality and personalization of responses over mass application volume to avoid ATS filters.
Ensure all generated responses demonstrate deep understanding of the vacancy's key performance indicators (KPIs) and pain points.
Maintain a clear separation between core agent logic and external integration points (e.g., parsers, communication modules).
All new features must support the project's long-term vision of becoming a full-cycle, data-driven recruitment platform.
